amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record that strikes $200,000 from the research and education activities account for competitive research grants and transfers it to the Office of the Chief Economist of the USDA.

action.text: Substitute (A006) offered by Mr. Skeen to the Condit amendment (A005).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skeen amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
